body:
Way to go Rippadou excellent ending.
No need to wait for tardy ViolenceJacks or Hokuto Kenshiros to save them from further slaverape prisoner torture which by the way Tomino bastard is what also happens in war not baring fairies or naking princis so to kill them all in battles or not by the end of series you genocidal maniac.
Same goes 4 devilish Nagai Go.
Wish they all learned from Shinkaigiyo example.

Even untranslated hentai has its evolution progress from various tag and anthology which is the most annoying imprecise to its final b&w precision like this masterpiece which lacks not color nor gif or even sound vid let alone 3d cgi.
Only romanized characters names are missing but at least you have most in sex like paheal eng or jap rule34 not that artsy mixed non-h gelbooru(they should have a nsfw full h geekbooru instead).
